description: Listed building application for the formation of new entrance and building identification signage recessed into the proposed cast stone frontage to the southern elevation of the building (fronting Norman Street), formation of four number smoke outlet vents in the pavement to the south and west elevations, infilling of light wells to form additional internal floorspace at second floor level and their replacement at roof level, alterations to the roof to include the formation of a glazed link addition, new roof to the north-west elevation at first floor level, installation of a rooflight to the lift shaft at first floor level, part replacement of the existing roof, installation of plant and safety equipment (at roof level), internal refurbishment of the building to include the provision of improved swimming pool facilities, excavation of basement and refurbished Turkish Baths, new laundry/community room, improved changing rooms and access, and a new reception area.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The works hereby permitted shall be begun no later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
